full_threads.body:
Hi all,

Seems like I missed that email. My apologies!

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Bonnie,

Yes, this has been resolved. We have updated the shipping calculations.

It seems you didn't received our response to you yesterday.

Good afternoon,

Just following up on this one.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966

Confirming the shipping has been updated.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

Hi,

Can you please look into why customers are being charged shipping if their order is over $99? I believe this wasn't an issue with the previous website. We have a customer holding off on an order until this is resolved.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
Marketing Communications Manager


bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

0408 331 966

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

To: Bonnie Sudirwan <bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au>

Subject: FW: Re: New contact form submission from the Thermacell website [ thread::IIMau_JtfJ6ilwttBTIx830:: ]


Hi Team,


See below and attachments. Customer is charged freight while on website it says free delivery on orders $99 onwards.



Many thanks,
Mabel


--------------- Forwarded Message ---------------
From: Jenny Reimann [jenny.reimann2@gmail.com]
Sent: 5/2/2025, 3:12 pm
To: customerservice@mayohardware.com.au
Subject: Re: New contact form submission from the Thermacell website [ thread::IIMau_JtfJ6ilwttBTIx830:: ]

Hi Mabel,
Gosh this was the first time I've done a screenshot so I could only work out how to do it as an attachment.
But I did it!

As you will see it shows freight being charged even though I've ordered $199 worth of goods.

Bunnings is a fair drive for us. It's 50 kms in one direction and 60 kms in the other direction so would prefer to do this online.

Hoping you can help.

many thanks & kind regards

Jenny

On Wed, 5 Feb 2025 at 09:36, Mayo Hardware Customer Service AU <customerservice@mayohardware.com.au> wrote:


Hi Jenny,

Please order this again online and send screenshot if you are being charged.

Kind Regards,
Mabel Ceballos

On the website it says orders over $99 it is free freight.
My order was for $199 and I was being charged $10 freight.
Could you please check that.
Many thanks
Jenny

Hello,

Thank you for your email to Mayo Hardware Pty Ltd.

Freight charge is standard.
Otherwise please order THR10 from Bunnings Special orders desk as we are Distributors.


Kind Regards,
Mabel Ceballos
